channel.title: News on Eclipse 4diac
channel.description: Recent content in News on Eclipse 4diac

item.title: Test test test
item.author: 4diac-dev@eclipse.org (Eclipse 4diac Team)
item.description: Testsite to test the test is the Fusion of IEC 61499 programming and ISO 11783 compatibiltiy. Now logiBUS® won a prestigious award: “Award for innovative digital farming” it was awarded at the 44th Annual Conference at the University of Hohenheim of the Society for Information Technology in Agriculture, Forestry and the Food Industry e.V. Cheers, Franz Höpfinger on behalf of HR Agrartechnik GmbH
